title: Gheorghe Gajion
text:
Gheorghe Gajion (born 13 November 1992) affectionately known by fans as "The Beast From The East" is a Moldovan <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who plays for the <a href="Ospreys%20%28rugby%20union%29">Ospreys</a> and Bridgend Ravens as a <a href="prop%20%28rugby%20union%29">prop</a>. He is also a Moldovan international.
Gajion joined the Ospreys in 2018 having previously played for <a href="Rugby%20Rovigo%20Delta">Rugby Rovigo</a> in Italy and <a href="Trelissac%20Rugby">Trelissac</a> in France.
Gajoin returns to France to play for <a href="Pro%20D2">Pro D2</a> <a href="Stade%20Aurillacois%20Cantal%20Auvergne">Aurillac</a> for the 2020–21 season.
